_header: This world is of so great a space
Subjects: dialogues; wise men; wisdom; youth, folly of
_description: Interrogacio juvenis & Responsio sapientis — one cross-rhymed quatrain

BLAdd10392.Transcription:
Þis wordle is of so grete aspacehyt wolle not in my armes
                    tweyneHo þat alle þinge wolle embracelytelle þing may
                    hym susteyn

Doyle,  A. I. 
             “More Light on John Shirley; Part 1.” 
             Medium Ævum
         30 (1961): 93-101: 98.
